name: User Word List File
summary: Learn about .UWL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: UWL files are saved in the format "WTXXYY.UWL", where "XX" is the program version and "YY" is the code for language or location of origin (e.g., "US" for US English).

Older UWL files may be imported into newer versions of WordPerfect by renaming the version digits in the UWL file. In some program versions, you may also update older files to newer program formats using the User Word List option in the spell checker.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
